page.title: 14Transport E.K.Traffic Flow
page.content: Our starting place is Greenhills Roundabout.The traffic going to Newlandsmuir, (or part of Greenhills itself), must pass three schools on Crosshouse Road;Crosshouse Primary, St.Vincents Primary and Ballerup Secondary.Although there is an underpass and a footbridge,some people use the road for quickness.The cars passing are putting the scholars lives in danger.If the new Greenhills road were to be opened at the Greenhills roundabout the cars would use that road as a through road and leave Crosshouse road much safer and quieter for the residents of this part of Greenhills.We did a survey of traffic on Crosshouse road.We checked for one hour daily for one week.The average no.of cars was 167 cars per hour.The average no.of buses was 28 per hour. This road is too busy.
